author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-2958.  Don't register a new ApplicationIndexedLifecycleProviderFactory with every proxy to LifecycleProviderFactoryGBean.

author: evenisse
msg: [SCM-286] Allow two provider implementations in classpath

author: mlovett
msg: Move the StorageMap off the context, and into the storage manager

author: jstrachan
msg: rolled back the creation of the file: scheme and made the xbean: scheme handle files or URLs as well as classpath resources

author: jm
msg: bug 5344: binmode() causes 'CR NL' ('\r\n') to be read as 'NL' ('\n').  fix this by using the octal escape sequences: \015\012, instead, in the core spots where we access user-submitted mail data through a filehandle that may be affected by binmode.
